title: India power emissions must peak by 2026 to meet Paris pact
description: India's power industry emissions must peak by 2026 to achieve net zero by mid-century, according to BloombergNEF. However, the government's push for coal usage makes this target unlikely. India needs $12.4 trillion in investment for clean energy, electric vehicles, and new technologies like carbon capture and green hydrogen.
